name: Hacker News Bot
description: Slackbot written in the Rust framework Iron.Uses node to monitor Slack channels and scrapes Hacker News and returns the top 5 linsk wheneber hacker news is mentioned. Second projects completed in Rust.

name: Zot
description: Slackbot written in Node. Uses axios to make any Api requests. Example actions include a spotify song player and word alert system. Additioanl actions can be easily added.

name: SpotOn
description: Final project at General Assembly written using JS from the front to the back (MEAN Stack). Visually represetns connections between artists on Spotify using D3.js
